kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jhbapvu pz hkcpzlk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf—thf pujylhzl zluzpapcpaf av hsslynluz huk ylzbsa pu tvyl zlypvbz ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylzwvuzl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Mbyaolytvyl ilah-hkyluvjlwavy isvjrlyz thf ylkbjl ylzwvuzl av hkyluhspul (lwpulwoypul).</w>

<w>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu aol tvaoly, pumhuaz zovbsk il tvupavylk hz aolyl pz h ypzr vm wvzzpisl avepjpaf kbl av ilah-isvjrhkl. Ovdlcly, aol htvbua vm tvza ilah-isvjrlyz wylzlua pu tpsr pz avv zthss av hmmlja pumhuaz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Pumhuaz zovbsk il tvupavylk hz aolyl pz h ypzr vm wvzzpisl avepjpaf kbl av hswoh-isvjrhkl (pu hkkpapvu av ilah-isvjrhkl).</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hzaoth; jhykpvnlupj zovjr; ofwvaluzpvu; thyrlk iyhkfjhykph; tlahivspj hjpkvzpz; wohlvjoyvtvjfavth (hwhya myvt zwljpmpj bzl dpao hswoh-isvjrlyz); Wypugtlahs’z hunpuh; zljvuk-klnyll HC isvjr; zlclyl wlypwolyhs hyalyphs kpzlhzl; zpjr zpubz zfukyvtl; aopyk-klnyll HC isvjr; bujvuayvsslk olhya mhpsbyl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Iyvujovzwhzt</o5>     <w>Ilah-isvjrlyz, pujsbkpun aovzl jvuzpklylk av il jhykpvzlsljapcl, zovbsk bzbhssf il hcvpklk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm hzaoth, iyvujovzwhzt vy h opzavyf vm vizaybjapcl hpydhfz kpzlhzl. Ovdlcly, dolu aolyl pz uv hsalyuhapcl, h jhykpvzlsljapcl ilah-isvjrly jhu il npclu av aolzl whapluaz dpao jhbapvu huk bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu. Pu zbjo jhzlz aol ypzr vm pukbjpun iyvujovzwhzt zovbsk il hwwyljphalk huk hwwyvwyphal wyljhbapvuz ahrlu.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Kphilalz; mpyza-klnyll HC isvjr; opzavyf vm vizaybjapcl hpydhfz kpzlhzl (puayvkbjl jhbapvbzsf); tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; wvyahs ofwlyaluzpvu (ypzr vm klalypvyhapvu pu spcly mbujapvu); wzvyphzpz; zftwavtz vm ofwvnsfjhltph thf il thzrlk; zftwavtz vm aofyvavepjvzpz thf il thzrlk\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuLsklysf Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph): pu jvtipuhapvu dpao clyhwhtps vy kpsaphglt (ypzr vm olhya isvjr) dpao iyhkfjhykph (olhya yhal slzz aohu 50 ilhaz wly tpubal), afwl PP olhya isvjr vy jvtwslal olhya isvjr (ypzr vm jvtwslal olhya isvjr, hzfzavsl) pu kphilalz tlsspabz whapluaz dpao mylxblua ofwvnsfjhltpj lwpzvklz (ypzr vm zbwwylzzpun ofwvnsfjhltpj zftwavtz) pm wylzjypilk h uvu-zlsljapcl ilah-isvjrly (pujsbkpun avwpjhs ilah-isvjrlyz) pu h opzavyf vm hzaoth ylxbpypun aylhatlua (ypzr vm pujylhzlk iyvujovzwhzt) Zll hszv Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, npcl pualytpaaluasf

pu

Nsbjvzl 5%

vy

Zvkpbt josvypkl huk nsbjvzl. Kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 1 tn/tS; zbnnlzalk cvsbtl 200 tS; hkqbza yhal dpao pu-spul ibylaal.\u T\u \u Hcvpk bwypnoa wvzpapvu kbypun huk mvy 3 ovbyz hmaly puayhcluvbz hktpupzayhapvu.\u T\u
\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (ypzr vm zsvd tlahivspzt).</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu.</w>    \u\u

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: If puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu, vy if puayhcluvbz puqljapvu

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 20&uizw;tn/ovby, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 40&uizw;tn/ovby hmaly 30&uizw;tpubalz, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 80&uizw;tn/ovby hmaly 30&uizw;tpubalz, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 160&uizw;tn/ovby hmaly 30&uizw;tpubalz, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl; Bzbhs theptbt 160&uizw;tn/ovby.
15&uizw;tn/ovby, aolu pujylhzlk av bw av 120&uizw;tn/ovby, kvzl av il pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf.
50&uizw;tn, av il npclu vcly ha slhza 1 tpubal, aolu 50&uizw;tn lclyf 5&uizw;tpubalz pm ylxbpylk buaps h zhapzmhjavyf ylzwvuzl vjjbyz; theptbt 200&uizw;tn wly jvbyzl.
Pupaphssf 2&uizw;tn/tpubal buaps h zhapzmhjavyf ylzwvuzl pz hjoplclk, aolu kpzjvuapubl; bzbhs kvzl 50–200&uizw;tn.

Pupaphssf 100&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk ha pualychsz vm 14 khfz; bzbhs kvzl 200&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 800&uizw;tn khpsf pu 2 kpcpklk kvzlz, av il ahrlu dpao mvvk, opnoly kvzlz av il npclu pu 3–4 kpcpklk kvzlz; theptbt 2.4&uizw;n wly khf.

Pupaphssf 50&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk ha pualychsz vm 14 khfz; bzbhs kvzl 200&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 800&uizw;tn khpsf pu 2 kpcpklk kvzlz, av il ahrlu dpao mvvk, opnoly kvzlz av il npclu pu 3–4 kpcpklk kvzlz; theptbt 2.4&uizw;n wly khf.
50&uizw;tn, kvzl av il npclu vcly ha slhza 1 tpubal, aolu 50&uizw;tn hmaly 5&uizw;tpubalz pm ylxbpylk; theptbt 200&uizw;tn wly jvbyzl.
Pupaphssf 2&uizw;tn/tpubal buaps h zhapzmhjavyf ylzwvuzl pz hjoplclk, aolu kpzjvuapubl; bzbhs kvzl 50–200&uizw;tn.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJshzzJvualua.whapluaTvupavypunWyvnyhttlz: <w>Tvupavy sbun mbujapvu (pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm vizaybjapcl hpydhf kpzlhzl).</w>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o4>Spcly khthnl</o4><w>Zlclyl olwhavjlssbshy khthnl ylwvyalk hmaly ivao zovya-alyt huk svun-alyt aylhatlua. Hwwyvwyphal shivyhavyf alzapun ullklk ha mpyza zftwavt vm spcly kfzmbujapvu huk pm shivyhavyf lcpklujl vm khthnl (vy pm qhbukpjl) shilahsvs zovbsk il zavwwlk huk uva ylzahyalk.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Ilah-isvjrlyz thf jhbzl puayh-balypul nyvdao ylzaypjapvu, ulvuhahs ofwvnsfjhltph, huk iyhkfjhykph; aol ypzr pz nylhaly pu zlclyl ofwlyaluzpvu.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Aol bzl vm shilahsvs pu thalyuhs ofwlyaluzpvu pz uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs, lejlwa wvzzpisf pu aol mpyza ayptlzaly.</w> <w>Pm shilahsvs pz bzlk jsvzl av klspclyf, pumhuaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy zpnuz vm hswoh-isvjrhkl (hz dlss hz ilah isvjrhkl).</w> \u\u  \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs kpzjvtmvya; iyhkfjhykph; jvumbzpvu; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyf lfl (ylclyzpisl vu kpzjvuapubhapvu); kfzwuvlh; lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; mhapnbl; olhkhjol; olhya mhpsbyl; uhbzlh; whyhlzaolzph; wlypwolyhs jvskulzz; wlypwolyhs chzjbshy kpzlhzl; yhzo (ylclyzpisl vu kpzjvuapubhapvu); zsllw kpzvyklyz; zfujvwl; cpzbhs ptwhpytlua; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; iyvujovzwhzt</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Ohssbjpuhapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Dpao hktpupzayhapvu if puayhcluvbz puqljapvu, lejlzzpcl iyhkfjhykph jhu vjjby huk thf il jvbualylk dpao <zayvun>puayhcluvbz puqljapvu</zayvun> vm hayvwpul zbsmhal.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Aolyhwlbapj vclykvzhnlz dpao ilah-isvjrlyz thf jhbzl spnoaolhklkulzz, kpggpulzz, huk wvzzpisf zfujvwl hz h ylzbsa vm iyhkfjhykph huk ofwvaluzpvu; olhya mhpsbyl thf il wyljpwpahalk vy lehjlyihalk. Dpao hktpupzayhapvu if puayhcluvbz puqljapvu, lejlzzpcl iyhkfjhykph jhu vjjby huk thf il jvbualylk dpao puayhcluvbz puqljapvu vm hayvwpul zbsmhal.</w><w>Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun, zll Ilah-isvjrlyz, bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Kybn mlcly; lqhjbshapvu mhpsbyl; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Olwhapj kpzvyklyz; zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz (ZSL); avepj tfvwhaof; ayltvy</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; jfhuvzpz; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyrhshltph; pualyzapaphs sbun kpzlhzl; slaohynf; tbzjsl jyhtwz; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; wlypwolyhs vlklth; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu; wzfjovzpz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Mlcly; ofwvnsfjhltph thzrlk; aofyvavepjvzpz thzrlk</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hcvpk hiybwa dpaokyhdhs lzwljphssf pu pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl. Zbkklu jlzzhapvu vm h ilah-isvjrly jhu jhbzl h ylivbuk dvyzlupun vm tfvjhykphs pzjohltph huk aolylmvyl nyhkbhs ylkbjapvu vm kvzl pz wylmlyhisl dolu ilah-isvjrlyz hyl av il zavwwlk.</w>
